label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Added webhook support in v1.14.0, marking the first release to officially support the new WebHook provider, allowing for the extension of ExternalDNS.

label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Filtered out entire endpoints if they end up without targets after filtering in targetFilterSource.

label: kind/bug-fix
impact/medium
notes.text: Fixed planning for multi-cluster dual stack record types.

label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Added support for --label-filter for node source.

label: kind/bug-fix
impact/medium
notes.text: Fixed a bug in the Linode provider to prevent the creation of duplicate TXT records, skipping existing records.

label: kind/bug-fix
impact/medium
notes.text: Fixed a bug by filtering peering zones in the Google provider.

label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Allowed opt-out of service account token automounting.

label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Added support for external IP in the Ambassador host source.
